content:

You're getting close to redeeming rewards at several programs! Remember to update the table as you earn more points or redeem rewards.

Some suggestions to help you make the most of your loyalty programs:

* Consider setting a reminder for the StyleHub sale to ensure you redeem your points for the $25 gift card.
* With 500 points at SmartMart, you might want to plan your next purchase to maximize the value of your $5 discount.
* Keep earning points at PetPal to reach the Silver Tier and enjoy 10% off all purchases.
